Name: Move Log history Viewer
I want: A .txt file where I can view all the moves done
So that: I can analyze my game and how I played at the end
IMPL Details: Create a text file and update it based on the moves done/undone.

Name: Move log update
I want: A system that updates the move log based on undos, skipped turns, and moves.
So that: I can view all the moves done in the game even with the game closed from a text file
IMPL Details: Update a text file created in the beginning with the respective current game moves.

Name: Skip Turn
I want: A way that I can skip my turn in a game
So that: I can pass my turn without updating the board
IMPL Details: Skip turn input that changes instance of turn and doesn’t do any moves.

Name: Possible Best Move
I want: A way that I can ask for a hint to help with choosing my move
So that: I can play the best move if I don't know what to pick
IMPL Details: Add a hint option before pickig move that displays the best move of the greedy agent

Name: Randomize Board
I want: A way that I can randomize the board in the game
So that: I can play with different situation of the game where I don’t start with standard moves.
IMPL Details: Change the instance of the board to have the pieces randomized in their position on the board

Name: Exit Feature
I want: A UI that allows me to exit the game
So that: I can leave the game mid-way
IMPL Details: Create an option that allows the user to exit the game.

Name: Custom Pieces
I want: A way that I can change the piece types from the original "O" and "X"
So that: I can customize the pieces and the looks of the game
IMPL Details: Add an option in the beginning that takes a single alphanumeric choice and changes the piece type display based on that

Name: Print Move History
I want: A way to see my previous moves
So that: I can view my previous moves one at a time to see what move I did
IMPL Details: Create a moves list that can be iterated through each turn and printed to the console
